snippet.title: SOOT Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
SOOT is a Strategy Simulation game in which you will take control of the crew of the Ziggurat, a roaming space station that terraforms planets to exploit their resources and build colonies.
Uncover a deep story filled with intrigue and twists while solving challenging levels in a delicate system of balances and counterbalances.

Get SOOT now on Steam: bit.ly/3vIZEmp  

Music: 
The Rise by Scott Buckley
https://www.scottbuckley.com.au/library/the-rise/
